name: Kill 3 Common Monsters
info: Too many monsters have began surrounding the town. Show them we are not to be messed with.

name: Kill 2 Vicious Monsters
info: Some strong monsters have been ransacking the village. Eliminate immediately!

name: Kill 3 Goblins
info: Goblins have been ambushing our caravans. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Kill 3 Slimes
info: Slimes are disgusting! Will pay for removing some of these vile creatures from our land.

name: Kill 3 Wolves
info: Wolves are dangerous! Help make the Plains a safer place to travel.

name: Find 3 Health Potions
info: I have decided to start on an adventure. I am in need of a few Health Potions to start off my journey properly.

name: Find 1 Greater Mana Potion
info: Mage in desperate need of a Greater Mana Potion. Please bring it to me at the Inn and I will pay you in gold.

name: Kill a Vicious Slime
info: Vicious Slime, awful monster, please kill.

name: Kill a Vicious Goblin
info: A Vicious Goblin has eaten all my corn. Take it out and I will reward you handsomely.

name: Kill 5 Common Monsters
info: I am doing a survey of the Forest. Please bring back some samples of the local monsters.

name: Kill 3 Vicious Monsters
info: A trio of vicious monsters have eaten all my cows! Avenge me and I will give you what I can.

name: Kill 3 Orcs
info: Orcs have been ruining all my walks through the Forest. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Kill 3 Harpies
info: Harpies are the worst! Offering a reward to have some eliminated.

name: Kill 2 Spiders
info: Eww, there are so many Spiders in the Forest! Please exterminate, earn antidote.

name: Kill 3 Ogres
info: Ogres have stolen our wives! We will pay to have them killed and our wives back home.

name: Find a Death Scroll
info: I am in desperate need of a Death Scroll. I fancy a girl, but her brute of a father has forbade our union.

name: Find 3 Mana Potions
info: I am trying to improve my magic abilities. I need 3 Mana Potions so I can keep on practicing.

name: Kill a Vicious Ogre
info: A Vicious Ogre ate my dog. Help me get revenge on this terrible creature.

name: Kill 5 Common Monsters
info: Bring me the heads of 5 monsters and I will reward you with gold.

name: Kill 3 Vicious Monsters
info: Calling to all adventurers! The town mayor is paying to have vicious monsters slain.

name: Kill 3 Dire Wolves
info: Dire Wolves have been ruining all my walks outside town. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Kill 3 Giants
info: Giants are everywhere! They do not like the townsfolk and keep trying to eat them. Will Reward anyone who can eliminate some

name: Kill 3 Demons
info: Demons have been seen lurking just beyond the edge of town. Will pay to get rid of them.

name: Kill 3 Dragons
info: Dragons have been burning our crops and eating our livestock! Slay them and the reward is yours.

name: Find a Superior Health Potion
info: My husband is going off to war soon. I need a Superior Health Potion to make sure he comes back to me.

name: Find 2 Health Potions
info: Trading a Superior Health Potion for 2 regular Health Potions. Come find me at the Tavern when you have them.

name: Kill a Vicious Dire Wolf
info: A Dire Wolf has taken my family from me. I will give you everything I have if you slay the beast.

name: Kill a Demon
info: A Demon has torn our town apart. Kill it and you will be rewarded.
